prompt: Professional product photography, cinematic action shot of the subject captured with a high-speed camera. Surrounded by energetic, thematic splashes of colored liquid, frozen in time. Epic, clean studio background. Dramatic, volumetric studio lighting with sharp rim lights creating a powerful mood. Hyper-detailed, photorealistic, 8K resolution, professional color grading.

Elegant minimalist product shot on a clean, polished concrete slab. Soft, diffused light from a single large source creates gentle, long shadows. Composition is perfectly balanced, evoking a sense of calm and sophistication. The mood is modern, clean, and serene. Shot with a prime lens for ultimate sharpness, hyper-detailed, photorealistic.

The product is artfully placed amongst lush, damp moss, fresh green leaves with dew drops, and smooth river stones. The scene is illuminated by soft, dappled sunlight filtering through a forest canopy. The mood is tranquil, fresh, and pure. Shot with a macro lens, extremely shallow depth of field, hyper-realistic textures, 8K resolution.

Luxurious product shot resting on a rich, deep-colored velvet fabric with elegant folds. The lighting is soft and directional, highlighting the texture of the velvet and the product details. The mood is opulent, premium, and sophisticated. Macro details, shallow depth of field, professional studio lighting, photorealistic.

A modern, abstract composition featuring the product balanced with bold, solid-colored geometric shapes and platforms. Lighting is hard and architectural, creating sharp, defined shadows that are part of the composition. The color palette is minimalist and complementary. The mood is contemporary and stylish. 3D rendering style, ray tracing, photorealistic.

A bright, airy lifestyle shot of the product in a realistic, beautifully decorated home interior next to a large window. Warm, natural sunlight streams in, creating a hazy, golden hour feel. The mood is authentic, warm, and aspirational. Shot with a wide aperture, beautiful bokeh background, photorealistic, 8K.

Classic e-commerce shot of the product on a seamless white cyclorama background. The lighting is perfectly even, bright, and shadowless, ensuring the product is the sole focus. The mood is clean, professional, and commercial. Professional studio setup with multiple softboxes, focus stacking for infinite sharpness, hyper-detailed, 8K.

A dramatic, black and white film noir scene. The product is partially obscured in shadow, with hard, low-key lighting from a single source like light through window blinds (chiaroscuro). The atmosphere is tense and mysterious. High contrast, deep blacks, visible film grain, classic Hollywood feel, photorealistic.

The product is placed on a dark, sleek, reflective surface. The background features clean lines and subtle, futuristic glowing elements in a single accent color (e.g., blue or orange). Product in a cozy, rustic setting, resting on a knitted blanket next to a steaming mug and a good book. The lighting is warm and inviting, from a nearby fireplace or a warm lamp. The mood is comfortable, relaxing, and secure. Shallow depth of field, warm color temperature, photorealistic.

A meticulously styled top-down flat lay. The product is the centerpiece, surrounded by complementary, thematic objects and textures on a clean background. The composition is perfectly balanced. Lighting is even and shadowless. The mood is organized, creative, and narrative. Professional studio lighting, hyper-detailed, 8K.

A magical shot of the product floating or levitating gracefully in the center of the frame against a clean, minimalist studio background. High-speed photography, composite image, photorealistic.

Product placed on a rough, textured surface like cracked concrete or brushed metal in a gritty, industrial setting.
